page.title: 05HOUSES IN BROUGHTON
page.content: OUR CLASS DID A SURVEY TO SHOW THE AGE OF OUR HOUSES.HERE IS OUR CHART: AGE(years) AGE(years) 1- 85 :22 houses 186-285:1 house 86-185 : 4 houses 286+ :3 houses WE CAN SEE FROM THE CHART THAT MOST OF THE HOUSES WE LIVE IN WERE BUILT IN THE TWENTIETH CENTURY.OF THE THREE HOUSES OLDER THAN 286 YEARS, TWO WERE BUILT IN 1650 AND ONE WAS BUILT IN 1620.WE KNOW THAT BROUGHTON IS OLDER THAN 1620, BECAUSE THE CHURCH WAS BUILT IN THE TWELFTH CENTURY AND BROUGHTON WAS MENTIONED IN THE DOMESDAY BOOK.IN 1981 THE POPULATION WAS 1,422.THE NEW ESTATE HAS BROUGHT MORE PEOPLE.HERE IS THE NUMBER OF HOUSES WE COUNTED IN A THIRTY MINUTE TOUR OF BROUGHTON BY CAR: TERRACE:123 COTTAGES:18 FLATS:7 SEMI-DETACHED HOUSES:190 BUNGALOWS:84 DETACHED HOUSES:35 THE MOST COMMON IS SEMI-DETACHED.
